sn15.10:1.1: This Sutta is also at Iti 17 and [iti]18().
sn15.10:2.2: Mount Vepulla (“huge”; modern Vipula) lies immediately north of the Vulture’s Peak. It was probably visible to the Buddha, hence he used the proximate pronoun ima (“this”). Today it is crowned with a Jain temple. Its past names are given at SN 15.20.
